resources.string: Image button for battling the enemy

-When you create an account, you are assigned to a team. 
 -When you get close to an opposing team member, a notification will pop up on your device. 
 -Click on the button the fastest to win!

1. Create an account. 

2. When an enemy is near, click the button to fight. 

3. First player to hit the button is the winner of that round.

4. The team of the last remaining player, is the winner!
This game is much more fun with friends, so gather your friends and have them install Last Stand on their device!
